The misleading screenshot was published: 2020, and has been shared more than 690 times.
The screenshotted post: s photo shows a box of ear-loop filter masks with the Hong Kong Q-Mark Product Scheme logo and another "CSi" logo.
The post: s simplified Chinese caption translates to a claim that the masks were taken from a police station without payment, implying that Hong Kong police officers are hoarding face masks.
Hong Kong Police denied the misappropria: emphasizing that each government department is supplied with its share of face masks and that the current amount of protective gears given to front-line police officers is barely enough to meet their daily operational needs.
